--- In junit@y..., Mike Clark <mike@c...> wrote:
> Richard Jensen wrote:
> > Has anyone compared JUnit with JavaTest?
> >
> 
> Hmmm.... I thought Sun scrapped that product a while back, but I 
could be
> wrong.
> 
> Mike
> 
The .pdf I was given (for JavaTest 2.0) is dated August 1998. But it 
appears that Sun still references it from JCP:
http://www.jcp.org/aboutJava/communityprocess/speclead/tck/tsdg-10.pdf

(from May 2001). Chapter 6 references the JavaTest harness.

Richard.

Richard Jensen

subject: Re: Comparison to JavaTest?
